nodes.text: Carni chips were a type of food item that could be served with glaze sauce. The Wermal salesbeing Kedpin Shoklop noticed carni chips with glaze sauce being served during midmeal at the Canto Casino Hotel in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica during his stay there in 34 ABY.

Carni chips were mentioned in Saladin Ahmed's 2017 short story "Rules of the Game," written for the novella collection Canto Bight, which was released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi multimedia project.
